remarks: Lemma for ~ htth .  The collection ` K ` , which consists of functions ` F ( z ) ( w ) = <. w | T ( z ) >. = <. T ( w ) | z >. ` for each ` z ` in the unit ball, is a collection of bounded linear functions by ~ ipblnfi , so by the Uniform Boundedness theorem ~ ubth , there is a uniform bound ` y ` on ` || F ( x ) || ` for all ` x ` in the unit ball.  Then ` | T ( x ) | ^ 2 = <. T ( x ) | T ( x ) >. = F ( x ) ( ` ` T ( x ) ) <_ y | T ( x ) | ` , so ` | T ( x ) | <_ y ` and ` T ` is bounded.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
